description: Test data for realistic Timesheet workflow: Employee creates → Supervisor approves/rejects

employee.description: Employee who creates and submits timesheets

supervisor.description: Supervisor who reviews and approves/rejects timesheets

admin.description: Admin for setup and viewing all timesheets

TS_HAPPY_01.test_name: Employee creates timesheet, submits, Supervisor approves
TS_HAPPY_01.description: Complete happy path: Employee → Submit → Supervisor → Approve

TS_HAPPY_02.test_name: Employee saves draft, edits, then submits for approval
TS_HAPPY_02.description: Employee saves draft → Comes back → Edit → Submit → Approve
TS_HAPPY_02.expected_result: Draft saved, edited, submitted and approved

TS_ALT_01.test_name: Employee submits, Supervisor rejects with comment, Employee resubmits
TS_ALT_01.description: Submit → Reject (with comment) → Employee edits → Resubmit → Approve

test_data.rejection_comment: Hours exceed project allocation. Please adjust.

TS_ALT_02.test_name: Employee submits, Supervisor edits timesheet then approves

TS_ALT_03.test_name: Employee creates timesheet for multiple projects and activities
TS_ALT_03.description: Multiple project-activity combinations in one timesheet

TS_VAL_01.test_name: Employee enters overlapping hours in same day
TS_VAL_01.description: Validation: Cannot enter overlapping time slots
TS_VAL_01.expected_error: Total hours for Monday exceed 24 hours
TS_VAL_01.expected_result: Warning or error for excessive hours in one day

TS_VAL_02.description: Validation: Cannot submit timesheet without hours
TS_VAL_02.expected_result: Submission blocked - timesheet has no hours

TS_VAL_03.test_name: Employee creates timesheet for unassigned project
TS_VAL_03.description: Validation: Cannot add project employee is not assigned to
TS_VAL_03.expected_result: Project does not appear in dropdown

TS_VAL_04.test_name: Verify weekends and holidays are marked grey
TS_VAL_04.description: GUI: Weekend/holiday days should be visually distinct

TS_VAL_05.description: Security: Employee should not see approve button for own timesheet
TS_VAL_05.expected_result: Approve button not visible to employee

TS_PERM_01.test_name: ESS User cannot view other employees' timesheets
TS_PERM_01.description: Security: Employee cannot access Employee Timesheets page
TS_PERM_01.expected_result: Access denied or page not visible

TS_PERM_02.description: Permission: Supervisor can only view/approve assigned employees

TS_PERM_03.description: Permission: Admin has access to all employee timesheets

TS_GUI_01.test_name: Verify timesheet grid displays 7 day columns
TS_GUI_01.description: GUI: Timesheet grid shows Mon-Sun columns

TS_NEGATIVE_01.description: Validation: Negative hours should be rejected

TS_NEGATIVE_02.test_name: Enter hours exceeding 24 for one day
TS_NEGATIVE_02.description: Validation: Hours > 24 in one day should show error

TS_NEGATIVE_03.description: Validation: Non-numeric input should be rejected

TS_NEGATIVE_04.description: Validation: Comment should be required for rejection

TS_STATUS_01.test_name: Verify status changes: Not Submitted → Submitted → Approved
TS_STATUS_01.expected_result: Status changes correctly at each step

TS_STATUS_02.test_name: Verify status changes: Submitted → Rejected → Submitted → Approved
TS_STATUS_02.description: Track status with rejection in flow

TS_EDIT_01.test_name: Edit timesheet with status Not Submitted
TS_EDIT_01.description: Employee can edit timesheet before submission
TS_EDIT_01.expected_result: Edit successful for Not Submitted timesheet

TS_EDIT_02.test_name: Cannot edit timesheet with status Submitted
TS_EDIT_02.expected_result: Timesheet locked, Edit button not available
